name: Poop Fiction
description:
A Global Game Jam 2018 entry

An apartment building. Four different homes. A most awkward crime.

As the manager, you have to listen to your neighbors to solve an enigma. Can you do it?

BASED ON A TRUE STORY

CONTROLS

Keyboard — Arrow keys to move. A W D to select character dialogue. Space to interact.
Xbox controller — Left analogue to move. X Y B to select character dialogue. A to interact.

CREDITS

  • Programming/SFX: ThommazK @Thommaz
  • Story: Luiz Roveran @LuizRoveran
  • Art: Núria Pratginestós @ainam0n & Marília Marz @mariliamarz
  • Music: PH Mazzilli @Pedrohmaz
